title: Local Elections, Impeachment & Trade
itunes:title: Local Elections, Impeachment & Trade
description:
Kevin spoke with Greta Van Susteren, Chief National Political Analyst for Gray Media and Host of Full Court Press with Greta Van Susteren, Josh Galper, co-founder and partner of public relations firm Trident DMG and the law firm Davis, Goldberg & Galper, and Ryan Williams, Republican Strategist & Executive Vice President at Targeted Victory.


They discussed Republicans suffering a pair of defeats in off-year elections, the House impeachment probe, the 2020 elections, Jeff Sessions announcing his plan to run for the Alabama Senate seat that he vacated in 2017, and phase 1 of a U.S.-China trade deal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
